Description: Vues de la Basse-Egypte, one of six studies for Plate 16 of the artist's 'Voyage dans la Basse et la Haute Egypte, pendant les campagnes du Général Bonaparte', 1802; distant view of a fort, two small domed buildings at right Pen and grey ink, grey wash
Producer name: Drawn by: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Curator's comments: Engraved by Auguste Claude Simon Legrand for Denon's 'Voyage...' (there is no copy of the book the Department. The B.L. copy is at 458.h.12). Lit.: P. Rosenberg (ed.), exhib. cat., Paris, Musée du Louvre, 'Dominique-Vivant Denon: l'oeil de Napoléon', 1999, no. 83
Exhibition history: 1999/2000 Oct-Jan, Paris, Musée du Louvre, Denon 1747-1825 2000 Mar-June, Rome, Museo Napoleonico, Bonaparte in Egritto
Associated names: Associated with: Napoléon I, Emperor of the French (Napoleon)
Illustration to: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Associated titles: Voyage dans la Basse et la Haute Egypte
